title: Product Marketing Manager (PMM), Japan
summary: Imagine what you could do here. At Apple, great ideas have a way of becoming phenomenal products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish! ... Apple is looking for a dynamic and highly motivated Product Marketing Manager for Japan. This role will be based out of Tokyo.
description:
-  Provide product leadership from product introduction to end-of-life for our Japan business, supporting business and marketing reviews as needed
-  Execute hardware products, OS, and apps launches in Japan with excellence every time
-  Contribute to the annual Japan Marketing plan, outlining key opportunities and priorities for growth and category leadership, synthesizing research and business insights, and driving in-market execution for responsible products in the market
-  Support hardware products, OS, and apps launches with press, partner and customer-facing staff 
-  Liaise with worldwide Product Marketing and Engineering teams on relevant local business needs and feature requirements, influencing the product roadmap through clear recommendations that improve overall customer experience across hardware, software and services 
-  Become a visible and vocal member of the international Product Marketing team 
-  Be the guardian of product messaging and positioning across all key customer touch points, advancing the cause of excellence
key_qualifications: 7+ years of product management and marketing experience in related industries ... Possess expert knowledge of competitive and third party products, software applications and market trends across consumer, enterprise and education segments.
education_experience: Bachelor’s degree required. MS/MA/MBA preferred but not conditional.
